proxs¶

class proxs.KThreshold(iter_func)[source]¶

KThreshold proximity operator

This class defines linewise hard threshold operator with variable threshold

iter_func : function
Input function that calcultates the number of non-zero values to keep in each line at each iteration

CALLS:

  • utils.lineskthresholding()
op(data, extra_factor=1.0)[source]¶

Operator

This method returns the input data thresholded

data : np.ndarray
Input data array
extra_factor : float
Additional multiplication factor

np.ndarray thresholded data

reset_iter()[source]¶

Reset iter

This method sets the iterations counter to zero

class proxs.Simplex(mass=1, pos_en=False)[source]¶

Simplex proximity operator

This class defines a column wise projection onto a given positive simplex

CALLS:

  • psf_learning_utils.columns_wise_simplex_proj()
op(data, **kwargs)[source]¶

Operator

This method projects each column of the matrix data onto the simplex sum_i v_i = mass, v_i>=0

data : np.ndarray
Input data array

np.ndarray all positive elements from input data

class proxs.simplex_threshold(linop, weights, mass=None, pos_en=False)[source]¶

Simplex Threshold proximity operator This class stacks the proximity operators Simplex and Threshold

update_weights(weights)[source]¶

Update weights

This method update the values of the weights

weights : np.ndarray
Input array of weights
